Others don't (tuna, swordfish, mahi).

Know which is which.

3/ LOCATION matters.

Norwegian farmed salmon > sketchy wild-caught from unknown waters.

Sourcing transparency beats marketing labels.

4/ FRESHNESS trumps everything.

3-day-old wild fish < today's farmed fish.

Always.

4/ The sniff test works. Don't be shy. Ask to smell it before buying. Good fishmongers expect this.
5/ Same goes for ammonia smell (especially shellfish). That's bacteria having a party. Hard pass.
